001package gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.errors.Error;
004import gbw.melange.common.mesh.constants.IVertAttr;
005import gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.slicing.IFloatSlice;
006import gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.slicing.ISliceVec2;
007import gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.slicing.ISliceVec3;
008import gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.slicing.ISliceVec4;
009
010public class MultiTypeTableChecker {
011
012    public static <T extends IFloatSlice> Error checkKey(IVertAttr<T> key){
013        if(key.compCount() <= 0){
014            return new Error("A vertex attribute component count of " + key.compCount() + " is not supported.");
015        }
016        if(key.repressentativeClass() == null){
017            return new Error("A vertex attribute should contain what class best represents any data stored under this attribute.");
018        }
019        if(key.representationProvider() == null){
020            return new Error("A vertex attribute should declare how to produce the class that represents any data stored under this attribute.");
021        }
022        Error specificKnownCases = switch(key.compCount()) {
023            case 2 -> {
024                if(key.repressentativeClass().isAssignableFrom(ISliceVec2.class)){
025                    yield Error.NONE;
026                }
027                yield new Error("For a 2 component vertex attribute, the representative class should implement ISliceVec2.");
028            }
029            case 3 -> {
030                if(key.repressentativeClass().isAssignableFrom(ISliceVec3.class)){
031                    yield Error.NONE;
032                }
033                yield new Error("For a 3 component vertex attribute, the representative class should implement ISliceVec3.");
034            }
035            case 4 -> {
036                if(key.repressentativeClass().isAssignableFrom(ISliceVec4.class)){
037                    yield Error.NONE;
038                }
039                yield new Error("For a 4 component vertex attribute, the representative class should implement ISliceVec4.");
040            }
041            default -> Error.NONE;
042        };
043        if(key.compCount() > 4 && !key.repressentativeClass().isAssignableFrom(IFloatSlice.class)){
044            return new Error("For representing the data of attributes of any component count, use something that implements IFloatSlice.");
045        }
046        return specificKnownCases;
047    }
048}
